page.title: 12PUBS IN FENCE
page.content: {HARPERS INN (PUB) POOL TABLE,DARTS,BAR. IT IS QUITE POSH AND MIDDLE AGED PEOPLE GO THERE. {SPARROW HAWK (PUB) PROPER MEALS,BAR,BANDIT,SNACKS. IT IS A POSH PUB AND PEOPLE OF ALL AGES GO THERE. {THE SWAN (PUB) BAR,DARTS. IT IS ON THE MAIN ROAD. THE BYPASS AND GETS A LOT OF PASSING TRAFFIC (SALESMEN ETC). {BAY HORSE <PUB> }FOR PEOPLE IN THEIR TWENTIES IT HAS A POOL TABLE AND MUSIC.ITIS A SMART LOOKING PUB AND IS ON THE BYPASS {THE FORESTERS <PUB>}THIS IS ON THE ROAD DOWN TO BRIERFIELD AND NO ONE LIVES NEAR IT SO IT ATTRACTS MOBILE DRINKERS WHO MUST DRINK AND DRIVE!
